verses.verse: And I looked when the Lamb opened one from the seals and listened to one from the four living beings saying as a voice of thunder, "Come and see."
And I looked, and, look, a white horse and the one sitting on it having a bow. And an award wreath was given to him, and he went out conquering and so that he might conquer.
And when He opened the second seal, I listened to the second living being saying, "Come and see."

And another horse went out, a fire-colored one, and to the one sitting on it, it was given to him to take the peace away from the earth, even so that they will slaughter each other. And a huge knife was given to him.
And when He opened the third seal, I listened to the third living being saying, "Come and see." And I looked, and, look, a black horse and the one sitting on it having a beam balance in his hand.

And I heard a voice in the middle of the four living beings saying, "A quart of wheat is a denarius ($50), three quarts of barley are a denarius ($50), and you should not harm the olive oil and the wine."
And when He opened the seal, the fourth one, I heard the voice of the fourth living being saying, "Come and see."

And I looked, and, look, a green horse and the one sitting up on top of it. A name for him is Death, and Hell (Hades) follows with him. And authority was given to them over the fourth part of the earth to kill with a sword, with famine, with death (a plague), and by the wild animals of the earth.
And when He opened the fifth seal, I saw beneath the altar the souls of the people who had been slaughtered because of the message of God and because of the witness account that they were having.
And they yelled with a loud voice, saying, "Until when, the Owner, the sacred and the true One, are you not judging and retaliating for our blood out of the people residing on the earth?"

And long white robes were given to each of them, and it was stated to them that they should relax for a short time yet, until the time that both their fellow slaves and their brothers, the ones that are going to be killed as they also had been, will be accomplished.
And I looked when He opened the seal, the sixth one. And, look, a huge earthquake happened, the sun became black as cloth made of goat hair, the moon became as blood,
the stars of the sky fell to the earth as a fig tree throws its unripe figs as it is shook by a strong wind,
the sky was separated apart as a scroll being folded up, and every mountain and island were moved from their places.

And the kings of the earth, the greatest people, the rich, the commanding officers, the competent ones, every slave, and every free person hid themselves in the caves and in the rocks of the mountains.
And they say to the mountains and the rocks, "Fall on us, and hide us away from the face of the One sitting on the throne and away from the punishment of the Lamb
because the day, the great day, of His punishment came, and who is able to be stood up?"
